title: Fragment

properties.name: description
properties.value: Fragment may refer to one of the following:

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Fragment

Fragment may refer to one of the following:

  • Bone fragments, used to charge imbued skull sceptres
  • Dark essence fragments, used to craft blood and soul runes
  • Fragment of Seren, encountered during Song of the Elves
  • Fragments from Another Slice of H.A.M.:
    • Helmet fragment
    • Plaster fragment
    • Shield fragment
    • Sword fragment
  • Fragments of page 3 from The Slug Menace:
    • Fragment 1
    • Fragment 2
    • Fragment 3
  • Gold fragment, obtained during the 2017 Easter event
  • Guardian fragments, obtained whilst playing the Guardians of the Rift minigame
  • Ore fragments from the Volcanic Mine:
    • Iron ore fragment
    • Silver ore fragment
    • Coal fragment
    • Gold ore fragment
    • Mithril ore fragment
    • Adamantite ore fragment
    • Runite ore fragment
  • Plaster fragment, obtained during the quest In Aid of the Myreque
  • Soul fragment, obtained whilst playing the Soul Wars minigame
  • Star fragment, obtained from Dusuri's Star Shop to recolour prospector kits
  • Unidentified fragments from the Shattered Relics League:
    • Unidentified fragment (combat)
    • Unidentified fragment (harvesting)
    • Unidentified fragment (misc)
    • Unidentified fragment (production)
    • Unidentified fragment (skilling)
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
'''Fragment''' may refer to one of the following:

* [[Bone fragments]], used to charge [[Skull sceptre (i)|imbued skull sceptres]]
* [[Dark essence fragments]], used to craft [[Blood rune|blood]] and [[soul rune]]s
* [[Fragment of Seren]], encountered during [[Song of the Elves]]
* Fragments from [[Another Slice of H.A.M.]]:
** [[Helmet fragment]]
** [[Plaster fragment]]
** [[Shield fragment]]
** [[Sword fragment]]
* Fragments of [[page 3]] from [[The Slug Menace]]:
** [[Fragment 1]]
** [[Fragment 2]]
** [[Fragment 3]]
* [[Gold fragment]], obtained during the [[2017 Easter event]]
*[[Guardian fragments]], obtained whilst playing the [[Guardians of the Rift]] [[Minigames|minigame]]
* Ore fragments from the [[Volcanic Mine]]:
** [[Iron ore fragment]]
** [[Silver ore fragment]]
** [[Coal fragment]]
** [[Gold ore fragment]]
** [[Mithril ore fragment]]
** [[Adamantite ore fragment]]
** [[Runite ore fragment]]
* [[Plaster fragment]], obtained during the [[quest]] [[In Aid of the Myreque]]
* [[Soul fragment]], obtained whilst playing the [[Soul Wars]] [[minigame]]
* [[Star fragment]], obtained from [[Dusuri's Star Shop]] to recolour [[prospector kit]]s
* Unidentified fragments from the [[Shattered Relics League]]:
** [[Unidentified fragment (combat)]]
** [[Unidentified fragment (harvesting)]]
** [[Unidentified fragment (misc)]]
** [[Unidentified fragment (production)]]
** [[Unidentified fragment (skilling)]]
